responseHeaders.value: base-uri 'self'; connect-src *; default-src https://fonts.gstatic.com https://opensea.io https://testnets.opensea.io https://static.opensea.io https://openseauserdata.com; img-src data: *; frame-src *; font-src data: *; manifest-src 'self' static.opensea.io; media-src *; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' fonts.googleapis.com 'unsafe-inline';script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';
